Question: In 1972, this person played 10 sold-out concerts at the Greek Theatre in Los Angeles.
Hints: In reality, this person had written and recorded these songs for himself, but the cover versions were released before his own.
on the April 30th broadcast, this person premiered a new song, "Pretty Amazing Grace" from his album Home Before Dark.
This person eventually triumphed in court, and secured ownership of his Bang-era master recordings in 1977.
